text: Sidney Alexander "Sandy" Silver (born October 15, 1969) is a Canadian politician. He is the ninth and current Premier of Yukon since 2016. He was first elected to the Yukon Legislative Assembly in the 2011 election.Yukon Votes 2011: Klondike CBC News, October 11, 2011. He represents the electoral district of Klondike and is Leader of the Yukon Liberal Party. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of Yukon
title: Sandy Silver
